content: Create a workflow that retrieves data from mwater, google sheets, netsuite, ferntech.io and processed it and sends it to frappé

I'll need more information about your workflow to create an accurate YAML. Specifically: What kind of data are you retrieving from each source (mWater, Google Sheets, NetSuite, ferntech.io)? What processing needs to be done on this data? What type of data needs to be sent to Frappé? Should this workflow run on a schedule or be triggered by an event? With these details, I can create a proper workflow structure for you.
data about water systems and water sales
